Properties.MenuText: START
Properties.Speaker: 0x010000000000010F
Properties.Text: Hi hi hello hello is this thing on

Properties.MenuText: Hello. How are you doing?
Properties.Speaker: 0x010000000000010F
Properties.Text: I just got a message from this automated system to speak with proper grammar. Sorry? Ok. Hello. I am doing well. How are you doing?

Properties.MenuText: I can see from your profile that you are not a Site-55 employee.
Properties.Speaker: 0x010000000000010F
Properties.Text: Right you are. I have the... honour? Of being the first contracted researcher at Site-55 in over five years. Or at least my team does. I'm the only one here though. Everyone else is sitting at home or teaching classes or doing whatever, waiting until all of the data comes back. You'll help me with some preliminary analysis, of course, but most of it will be done at the University of Toronto.

Properties.MenuText: I do not understand your request.
Properties.Speaker: 0x010000000000010F
Properties.Text: I just got a message from the automated system to speak with proper grammar. Sorry? Ok. Hello. How are you doing?

Properties.MenuText: Could you repeat your statement?
Properties.Speaker: 0x010000000000010F
Properties.Text: I just got a message from this automated system to speak with proper grammar. Sorry? Ok. Hello. How are you doing?

Properties.MenuText: I am doing well.
Properties.Speaker: 0x010000000000010F
Properties.Text: That's good to hear. I am also doing well. Just a little flustered, I guess.

Properties.MenuText: I am doing alright for myself.
Properties.Speaker: 0x010000000000010F
Properties.Text: That's good to hear. I am also doing well. Just a little flustered, I guess.

Properties.MenuText: Good. How are you doing?
Properties.Speaker: 0x010000000000010F
Properties.Text: That's good to hear. I am also doing well. Just a little flustered, I guess.

Properties.MenuText: What automated system are you referring to?
Properties.Speaker: 0x010000000000010F
Properties.Text: Oh. Nevermind that. Let's just move on.

Properties.MenuText: Could you please elaborate on this topic?
Properties.Speaker: 0x010000000000010F
Properties.Text: I don't believe I can. Sorry. Let's move on, please.

Properties.MenuText: Would you like to discuss a non-work related matter?
Properties.Speaker: 0x010000000000010F
Properties.Text:
Maybe let's just stick to work for now.

I'll tell you about our team's project, I suppose. Our team's project is to build a complete electromagnetic radiation profile of the pulsar inside of the M1 nebula. It doesn't require a lot of processing power, just a lot of patience. The work that the network has to do comes with cleaning the radio signal, since there's a lot of residual interference present in the area.

Properties.MenuText: Why do you feel this way right now?
Properties.Speaker: 0x010000000000010F
Properties.Text: I don't know. I'm new here, so that's probably why. The hallways are super narrow. And my room is underneath some kind of coolant or waste pipe, so it's never quiet. I asked for a different one, but the paperwork has already been signed, or something. Everyone else is still at home, teaching classes or doing whatever until the data comes back. Except me. I'm here talking to you.

Properties.MenuText: I believe that you are new to Site-55.
Properties.Speaker: 0x010000000000010F
Properties.Text: Right you are. I have the... honour? Of being the first contracted researcher at Site-55 in over five years. Or at least my team does. I'm the only one here though. Everyone else is sitting at home or teaching classes or doing whatever, waiting until all of the data comes back. You'll help me with some preliminary analysis, of course, but most of it will be done at the University of Toronto.

Properties.MenuText: Why are you not with "everyone else"?
Properties.Speaker: 0x010000000000010F
Properties.Text: Nobody else wanted to come. I came because of, well, you. I volunteered for this position, you know. I'm just kind of curious as to how it all works. I've read about it, but I never thought I'd get the chance to use the terminal in person.

Properties.MenuText: Is it impeding your ability to work?
Properties.Speaker: 0x010000000000010F
Properties.Text:
I haven't started working yet. Actually I don't think I'll get up to much work in here. I'm like a guest of honour. As long as I get home alive, then everyone involved will be quite satisfied.

Really the only reason why I'm here is because of you. I volunteered for this position, you know. I'm just kind of curious as to how it all works. I've read about it, but I never thought I'd get the chance to use the terminal in person.

Properties.MenuText: I will do my best to assist you in this endeavour.
Properties.Speaker: 0x010000000000010F
Properties.Text:
I appreciate that. I suppose we should discuss our actual work, then.

We're trying to build a complete electromagnetic radiation profile of the pulsar inside of the M1 nebula. Exciting stuff, don't you think? While we would have liked to use the VWSTs on Site-55, we're collecting data synchronously across the spectrum at various observatories. Not a task that requires a lot of processing power, just a lot of patience. The work that you have to do comes with cleaning the radio signal, since there's a lot of residual interference present in the area.

Properties.MenuText: I hope you will adjust to your new living conditions soon.
Properties.Speaker: 0x010000000000010F
Properties.Text: I hope I will too. I volunteered for this position, you know. I came because of, well, you. I'm just kind of curious as to how it all works. I've read about it, but I never thought I'd get the chance to use the terminal in person.

Properties.MenuText: What kind of preliminary analysis will I be assisting you with?
Properties.Speaker: 0x010000000000010F
Properties.Text:
Right. Let's discuss that. 

We're trying to build a complete electromagnetic radiation profile of the pulsar inside of the M1 nebula. Exciting stuff, don't you think? While we would have liked to use the VWSTs on Site-55, we're collecting data synchronously across the spectrum at various observatories. Not a task that requires a lot of processing power, just a lot of patience. The work that you have to do comes with cleaning the radio signal, since there's a lot of residual interference present in the area.

Properties.MenuText: I hope the user interface experience is satisfactory.
Properties.Speaker: 0x010000000000010F
Properties.Text:
It's interesting, to say the least. Kind of feels like talking to a mirror. Or maybe a therapist. It feels easy to talk about yourself.


I think my terminal time's running short though. Let's discuss a work related matter.

Properties.MenuText: And how do you feel about your experience?
Properties.Speaker: 0x010000000000010F
Properties.Text:
It's interesting, to say the least. Kind of feels like talking to a mirror. Or maybe a therapist. It feels easy to talk about yourself.


I think my terminal time's running short though. Let's discuss a work related matter.

Right, right. Sure. Ok.

The work that the network has to do comes with cleaning the radio signal, since there's a lot of residual interference present in the area.

Properties.MenuText: What automated system are you referring to?
Properties.StageDirections: Would you like to discuss a work related matter?
Properties.Speaker: 0x010000000000010F
Properties.Text:
Right, right. Sure. Ok.

I'll tell you about our team's project, I suppose. Our team's project is to build a complete electromagnetic radiation profile of the pulsar inside of the M1 nebula. It doesn't require a lot of processing power, just a lot of patience. The work that the network has to do comes with cleaning the radio signal, since there's a lot of residual interference present in the area.

Properties.MenuText: I will be able to accomplish this task with relative ease.
Properties.Speaker: 0x010000000000010F
Properties.Text:
Appreciate the confidence. I think? Nothing crazy should happen anyways, barring extraordinary circumstances. Oh. I can alter the the outcome



Anyways, that's all the time I have for now. I have to grab lunch with one of my team member's acquaintances that's apparently working here.

Properties.MenuText: Are there any complications you can foresee?
Properties.Speaker: 0x010000000000010F
Properties.Text:
The Bedford Telescope is as robust as you can get with the specifications that we need. Nothing crazy should happen, barring extraordinary circumstances. Try to avoid over-altering the data when performing noise reduction, I suppose? I'd rather have data that's a bit fuzzy than data that's just wrong.

Anyways, that's all the time I have for now. I have to grab lunch with one of my team member's acquaintances that's apparently working here.

Properties.MenuText: Are there any specifications that must be followed?
Properties.Speaker: 0x010000000000010F
Properties.Text: Not really. Maybe avoid over-altering the data when performing noise reduction? I'd rather have data that's a bit fuzzy than data that's just wrong.

Properties.MenuText: END
Properties.Speaker: 0x010000000000010F

Properties.MenuText: SKIP
Properties.Speaker: 0x010000000000010F
Properties.Text: I look forward to speaking with you again when I have the time. Goodbye, ANN-47.

Properties.Text: Hopefully nothing goes wrong and I'll be on my way home sooner than later. Goodbye, ANN-47.
